tourBios.curYrHigh: Shared PGA TOUR China medalist honors with Bio Kim at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament in mid-January in Kunming. Shot rounds of 69-72-70-70 to finish tied with Kim at 7-under, three strokes clear of runner-up Tommy Mou. Will be fully exempt for the entire season... Seven days later he earned conditional status on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica with a T10 finish at the Buenos Aires, Argentina Q-School. Lost a three-man playoff for two spots that secured exempt status for the first half of the season.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won two college events while playing for the University of Oklahoma. Tied for first at the 2015 Liberty Spring Invitational, six players finishing at 3-under 213 and the tournament not holding a playoff…Earned first-team All-Big 12 honors as a junior…Was an All-Academic Big 12 first-team selection during his junior and senior seasons…Was also an All-American Scholar during his final two college years.
tourBios.personal: Grew up playing the game at famed Southern Hills CC in his hometown of Tulsa, Okla... Twitter name is @csaxgolf
